messageText:
1. 0x6bc3331a20D448d3d5f49768C7E17268040F853d
2. 3r6PfvQYEVhwnHDFxcidmMVAH6seaN2HkK84FaP2m1ME
3. I sold the LP since I was really panicking at that time
4. I added C98-CASH LP 2 months ago, here is the TXID
3e4kKTm7qfTCo6UnFDcqgkzmX2AT8uXo4qRDPN24rr8sdqX4yKaASmvJgCyhww7Zm1qrjkjx45ojkiDY1Fh6tTRp
5. $6,900
6. I am grateful for your act of chivalry. This is the first time I have been a victim of an exploit. I feared that I had lost everything. I'm just a fresh graduate in Vietnam and have saved a small amount of money to skin in the Crypto game with the hope to change my life, that's why I chose a Protocol not many people know as Saros AMM to add liquidity. Though total LP value isn't all money I have, it's still vital to me. It is the amount of money I've been working so hard to earn over the past few months.So could you please refund me and give me a chance to start again. If the full refund is not possible, a half still makes a lot of sense. Please consider it.

Thank you so much, guys.
source:
I am grateful for your act of chivalry. This is the first time I have been a victim of an exploit. I feared that I had lost everything. I'm just a fresh graduate in Vietnam and have saved a small amount of money to skin in the Crypto game with the hope to change my life, that's why I chose a Protocol not many people know as Saros AMM to add liquidity. Though total LP value isn't all money I have, it's still vital to me. It is the amount of money I've been working so hard to earn over the past few months.So could you please refund me and give me a chance to start again. If the full refund is not possible, a half still makes a lot of sense. Please consider it.

Thank you so much, guys.
